start¶

  • params: name,appdir
  • path:/core/Application.py (line:121)

Start the application

You can only stop the application with return code 0 by calling j.Application.stop(). Don’t call sys.exit yourself, don’t try to run to end-of-script, I will find you anyway!

stop¶

  • params: exitcode
  • path:/core/Application.py (line:161)

Stop the application cleanly using a given exitcode
